charinfo.name: Hyuuga Hinata (S)
charinfo.description: With the Chuunin Exam behind her, and with Naruto's words deep in her heart, Hinata has grown and become stronger and a woman. With her mastery of the Hyuuga clan tactics, Hinata can give life to powerful chakra lions while hindering her enemies' chakra paths.

abilities.name: Pressure Point Closure
abilities.description: Hinata closes an enemy's pressure point dealing 10 damage to one enemy, increasing the cost of their skills by 1 random and removing all stacks of 'Hinata - Eight Trigrams Field' from them. During 'Hinata - Eight Trigrams Field' this skill will deal an additional 10 damage.

abilities.name: Gentle Step Twin Lion Fists
abilities.description: Hinata creates 2 lions. The next 2 times any enemy uses a new harmful skill, a chakra lion will attack, dealing 30 damage to them and removing 1 random chakra from them. During 'Hinata - Eight Trigrams Field' this skill will create 3 lions. This skill cannot be used while active and will end if Hinata is killed.

abilities.name: Hinata: Eight Trigrams Field
abilities.description: For 4 turns, if an enemy uses a new harmful skill, the chakra cost increase of 'Pressure-Point Closure' will last 1 additional turn and the following 4 turns 'Pressure Point Closure' and 'Gentle Step Twin Lion Fists' will be enhanced.

abilities.name: Byakugan Sight
abilities.description: This skill makes Hyuuga Hinata(s) invulnerable for 1 turn.
